page.title: 10Menus in the Wolfords
page.content: Today our farming family with teenagers had{breakfast}of cereals, bacon and tomatoes, toast, marmalade, coffee and orange juice. Around eleven am, we had coffee and a biscuit.{Lunch was shepherd's pie, cabbage, oranges. Mum had coffee. We had a friend for {tea}so had home made cakes, biscuits and tea.{Supper}at 7:45. A stir fried rice/vegetable/chicken dish. Baked apple for pudding. We parents had a glass of wine and then coffee.{Our {neighbour,}a retired cook on her own, started the day with two mugs of tea in bed, then had coffee and cornflakes for{breakfast. Lunch}was a pork chop potatoes, sprouts and stewed fruit plus coffee.{Tea}at 5 pm was crisp- bread with marmite and celery and lots of tea.{Supper}at 9 pm was yoghurt and fresh fruit. These are only sample menus, as there is no 'typical' home!
